name: Usagi-chan Bunny Treats F
description:
Usagi-chan needs your help! The little bunny, Usagi, is looking for you to help her create delicious treat recipes.
Join her in this adorable mobile game creating fun recipes by mixing different ingredients. Each new recipe you make, you can add as an ingredient and make even more! Show your friends what you are making in this additively fun game. Some desserts you may know by heart, while others you might have to learn what they are!
Usagi likes things from cupcakes to green tea ice cream! Just what is Ramune? And, doesn't everyone know how to make chocolate covered strawberries?

Have up to 20 items in this Free version. Get Usagi-chan Bunny Treats FREE today!
